page-meta.name: ## page-meta
page-meta.description: 页面元数据，用于设置页面的一些属性，如背景色、下拉刷新等
page-meta.compatibility:
### 兼容性
| Web | Android | iOS |
| :- | :- | :- |
| 4.19 | x | x |
page-meta.reference:
### 参见
- [参见uni-app相关文档](https://uniapp.dcloud.io/component/page-meta.html)
- [相关 Bug](https://issues.dcloud.net.cn/?mid=component.page-meta)

animation-view.name: ## animation-view
animation-view.description:
Lottie 动画
> 本 Component 是 uni ext component，需下载插件：[animation-view](https://ext.dcloud.net.cn/plugin?name=uni-animation-view)
animation-view.attribute:
### 属性 
| 名称 | 类型 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| path | string | "" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 动画资源地址，目前只支持绝对路径 |
| loop | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 动画是否循环播放 |
| autoplay | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 动画是否自动播放 |
| action | string | "stop" | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 动画操作，可取值 play、pause、stop |
@| 值名称 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| play | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 播放 |
@| pause | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 暂停 |
@| stop | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 停止 |
| hidden | boolean | false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | 是否隐藏动画 |
| @ended | (event: [UniEvent](/component/common#unievent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"}],"rows":[["-","3.9","4.11"]]}' /> | - |
animation-view.reference:
### 参见
- [参见uni-app相关文档](https://uniapp.dcloud.io/component/animation-view.html)
- [参见uni-app x相关文档](https://doc.dcloud.net.cn/uni-app-x/component/animation-view.html)
- [插件市场](https://ext.dcloud.net.cn/plugin?id=10674)
- [相关 Bug](https://issues.dcloud.net.cn/?mid=component.animation-view)
